description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying the user profile record.
Unique login identifier for the user account.
Display name shown in the application for this user.
User’s telephone contact number for notifications or support.
Preferred application language setting (coded value; confirm mapping).
User preference to show a confirmation dialog before deleting records.
User preference to show a confirmation dialog before saving changes.
Preferred date display pattern for the user interface and reports.
Preferred time display pattern for the user interface and reports.
Character used to separate values in lists/exports for this user.
Preference to show leading zeros on numeric identifiers in displays and reports.
User’s preferred first day of the week for calendars (coded value; confirm mapping).
Interval, in minutes, at which the system checks or refreshes work order information for this user.
Encoded alert/notification subscription settings for the user; likely a bitmask or foreign key (confirm with SME).
Threshold in minutes before escalating alerts or reminders to level two; confirm business rule with SME.
Identifier of the default warehouse used for this user’s inventory transactions.
Maximum monetary amount the user is authorized to approve for purchasing.
Identifier for the menu/navigation layout assigned to the user.
Encoded administrative privileges or options granted to the user.
User’s email address for communication and system notifications.
Free-text notes related to the user account.
Timestamp when this profile record was last updated in the system.
Likely the name of the last computer or company context associated with the user; confirm with SME.
Account status code (e.g., active/inactive); confirm code mapping with SME.
Indicates the account is currently locked due to security or administrative action.
Soft-delete flag indicating the profile is inactive but retained for audit.
Maximum idle time before automatic logout or session timeout; confirm units with SME.
Reference to the person/role authorized to approve this user’s purchasing; confirm linkage with SME.
Permission allowing edits to purchase orders after they have been sent to vendors.
Permission to transfer parts from other sites into the user’s site.
Permission to transfer parts from the user’s site to other sites.
Preferred work order report template identifier for printing or export.
Setting permitting the user to manage their Favorites menu organization.
Codes for UI tabs suppressed/hidden for this user to simplify the interface.
Identifier of the default warehouse used for fueling transactions by this user.
User role/type code determining permissions and UI behavior; confirm mapping.
Reference to a resource group or permission bundle assigned to the user; confirm with SME.
Timestamp when the user themselves last modified their profile; may mirror last_modified (confirm distinction).
Flag indicating whether to apply site-level default settings for this user.
Count of recent failed login attempts used for lockout decisions.
Code indicating the notification sound style for alerts; confirm allowable values.
Indicates whether system password policy is enforced for this account.
Restricts searches and reports to filters saved by this user only.
Enables touch-screen optimized features or detection for this user’s interface.
Identifier of the user’s personalized dashboard configuration; confirm reference target.
Indicates the password is locked due to policy violations until reset or admin action.
Flag requiring the user to change their password at next sign-in.
Identifier of the user who created this profile record.
Timestamp when this profile record was created.
Identifier of the user who last updated this profile record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this profile record.
